markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 41 **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Talamira](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1563) **Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 8 **Perception** +24; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Aiudara Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +30, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +27 **Str** -5 **Dex** +4 **Con** +0 **Int** +6 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +4 **Site Bound** Jewelgate way station --- **AC** 34 **Fort** +20 **Ref** +23 **Will** +26 **HP** 185 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Talamira's ghost is bound to the way station by the presence of the wailing crystals; if this hazard is deactivated or destroyed, Talamira sighs in relief as her memories are restored—this burst of psychic energy suffuses all PCs in the area, granting them access to the ancient tradition of magic she once followed, that of the [crystal keeper](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=34) archetype. A moment later, Talamira fades away, her soul moving on to the afterlife. --- **Speed** fly 30 feet **Melee** ghostly hand +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d10+12 negative **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 33, attack +27 - **Cantrips (7th)** [Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **2nd** [Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) - **4th** [Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) - **5th** [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219) - **6th** [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123) - **7th** [Power Word Blind](/Spells.aspx?ID=226), [Spell Turning](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) **Resonant Wail** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) Talamira releases an anguish-filled cry of despair. All creatures within 30 feet must attempt a DC 33 Will save to resist. Talamira can't use Resonant Wail for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature wails with anguish for 3 rounds. The shrieks resonate within the room's wailing crystals, giving the crystals a +2 status bonus on attack rolls against that creature during this time.
**Failure** As success, but the creature is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 minute as it sobs uncontrollably. If the creature is already slowed 1 by [_crushing despair_](/Spells.aspx?ID=57), it is slowed 2 as long as it's under both effects simultaneously.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the creature is also [stunned 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) from its overwhelming sadness. **Telekinetic Crystalline Assault** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) Talamira fills the air with whirling crystals, dealing 7d6 slashing damage to all creatures in a 30-foot emanation (DC 33 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
name: Talamira

A moment later, Talamira fades away, her soul moving on to the afterlife. --- Speed fly 30 feet Melee Single Action ghostly hand +27 (Agile, Finesse, Magical), Damage 3d10+12 negative Arcane Innate Spells DC 33, attack +27 - Cantrips (7th) Acid Splash, Detect Magic, Mage Hand, Ray of Frost, Shield - 1st Grease, Magic Missile, Ray of Enfeeblement - 2nd Acid Arrow, Glitterdust, Mirror Image - 3rd Blindness, Paralyze, Slow - 4th Confusion, Lightning Bolt, Suggestion - 5th Fireball, Magic Missile, Phantasmal Killer - 6th Chain Lightning, Cone of Cold, Flesh to Stone - 7th Power Word Blind, Spell Turning Resonant Wail Two Actions (Arcane, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental, Sonic) Talamira releases an anguish-filled cry of despair. All creatures within 30 feet must attempt a DC 33 Will save to resist. Talamira can't use Resonant Wail for 1d4 rounds. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature wails with anguish for 3 rounds. The shrieks resonate within the room's wailing crystals, giving the crystals a +2 status bonus on attack rolls against that creature during this time. Failure As success, but the creature is slowed 1 for 1 minute as it sobs uncontrollably. If the creature is already slowed 1 by crushing despair , it is slowed 2 as long as it's under both effects simultaneously. Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is also stunned 3 from its overwhelming sadness. Telekinetic Crystalline Assault Two Actions (Divine, Evocation) Talamira fills the air with whirling crystals, dealing 7d6 slashing damage to all creatures in a 30-foot emanation (DC 33 basic Reflex save).
